title: AIML - Sr Software Engineer, Siri on the Go
summary: The Siri on the Go teams bring Siri to our customers in the car, on their Apple Watch and on their AirPods. We build experiences that help them throughout their day, wherever they are! With millions of active customers, we are committed to developing and enhancing the Siri experience in a fast paced and rapidly-evolving technology space. We are looking for a highly experienced engineer to join our team and help us to build the newest features on these highly mobile devices. Join us and be a part of the team bringing Apple Intelligence to the entire Siri ecosystem!
description:
The Siri on the Go teams develop new features and experiences for our customers as they move through their day, using their car, Apple Watch or AirPods. We obsess over the customer experience and work hard to surprise and delight our customers with new ways to make their day-to-day lives better, using Siri. We are a team of engineers who work across the stack, from low-level performance optimizations to tapping into the most sophisticated AI models in Apple Intelligence. We are passionate about what we build and are looking for a highly experienced engineer to join our team!

This role is impactful, visible and challenging. You will be working across our teams to develop our next generation products, leveraging your understanding of AI, mobile devices and system architecture. You will be a hands-on part of new product bringup, developing and optimizing the Siri experience on new generations of Apple products. You will be a coach and a mentor for our junior engineers, while being able to tap into the collective experience and wisdom of our senior engineering community. You will partner with colleagues from across Apple to bring new ideas to life. You will do this while working in a team that genuinely loves what we do and are have fun doing it!
preferred_qualifications:
MS/Phd in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent experience
iOS software development experience
Experience with AI, NL, and Machine Learning
pay_benefits:
At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $166,600 and $296,300, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.

Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits.

Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
